Green Beauty Cosmetics Rejuvenating Face Oil

Brand: Green Beauty Cosmetics

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Fruit Oil, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Macadamia Ternifolia (Macadamia) Seed Oil, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Brassica Abyssinica (Abyssinian) Oil, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil

um (Sesame) Seed Oil, Rosa Canina (Rose Hip) Seed Oil, Olive Squalane, Calophylium Tacamahaca (Tamanu) Seed Oil, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Germ Oil, Tocopherol, Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Oil, Pelargonium Graveolens (Rose Geranium) Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender), Caucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Oil

ativa (Carrot) Oil

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
